About me

Hi, I am Viia and I am LUT student. I study 'tietotekniikkaa' it has many names in english such as information technology, Software and Systems Engineering, computer science and software engineering. I have a cat, Khonsu that keeps me company when I crochet. Lately I have been doing crocheting along with coding.
